channel.title: Java on Honza Pokorny
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Honza Pokorny

item.title: Android Development disappointments
item.description: The Android platform is the latest buzz in the smartphone world. I have previously written on why I prefer Android over iPhone. In this article, we will talk a little bit about what it’s like to develop native applications for Android. Android SDK uses Java. I know Java but it’s not my favorite. After working with Python and Django for months, going back to Java isn’t exactly easy. But it’s not undoable either.
